summary.span: 通知 ，告知其不应该生成任何更多的消息也不应使用任何更多的延迟消息。

span.span: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据流块上调用之后，该块将完成，并且其 任务在处理所有以前可用的数据后将进入最终状态。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data. 不会阻止等待完成，而是会启动请求;若要等待完成，可以 使用任务。 will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the task may be used.

member this.Completion : System.Threading.Tasks.Task

summary.span: 获取 ，其表示数据流块的操作和完成。

span.span: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据流块在当前未处理消息时，将被视为已完成，并保证其不会再处理其他消息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 完成关联的块后，返回的将转换为已完成状态。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 当块根据数据流块的定义语义成功完成其处理时，它将转换为状态; 当数据流块由于未经处理的异常而提前处理时，它将转换为状态，并且 当数据流块由于接收取消请求而提前处理结束时，它将转换为状态。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block's defined semantics, it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request. 如果任务在状态中完成 ，则其 `Exception` 属性将返回，其中 包含导致块失败的一个或多个异常。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property will return an containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.

summary.span: 导致 在 状态下完成。

span.span: Causes the to complete in a state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据流块上调用之后，该块将完成，并且其 任务将进入最终状态。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state. 如果对块进行错误处理，就像取消块那样，会导致缓冲消息 (未处理的输入消息，并 unoffered 输出消息) 丢失。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要为其保留消息的不需要从该 实例链接。The for which the message is to be reserved need not be linked from this instance. 此外，此 实例可能从未直接向提供消息 。Moreover, this instance may have never offered the message directly to the . 如果 `true` 返回，则您随后必须对 具有相同和的此消息调用或 。If `true` is returned, you must subsequently call either or for this message with the same and . 如果不这样做，源可能无法向任何目标传播任何进一步的消息。If you don't, the source may be unable to propagate any further messages to any target. 当目标持有任何内部锁时，请不要调用。Don't call while the target is holding any internal locks. 这样做将违反锁层次结构，以避免数据流网络中的死锁。Doing so will violate the lock hierarchy necessary to avoid deadlocks in a dataflow network.
